title: 【蚂蚁搬运】54个皮肤halucid作者合集
author: A180273196
txt_content:
本帖最后由 A180273196 于 2012-11-6 19:26 编辑 


     皮肤安装教程点我 


这些都是一个人做的·皮肤太多我会更新完的
作者：halucid 
http://www.planetminecraft.com/skin/yeti-with-real-moving-eyes-and-mouthi/

                           

下面含32个皮肤：包含
雪人/战神金刚/星球大战突击兵/哈尔/洛克人/虚空博士/Froad /Grinkin/
Froad//Grinkin /病毒受害者/大法师/ 法力的秘密 - 兰迪/戈薇 - 犬夜叉/
坏运气熊/巨灵/美味的芝士汉堡/美味的芝士汉堡/亚伯拉罕·林肯/小熊维尼/
亡灵战士/萨尔达传说/强盗/企业僵尸/僵尸女孩/蝙蝠侠/蝙蝠侠/黑骑士/道崎/
便宜的西装爬行/皮肤的缺口（与裤子！）/矿工皮肤/矮人的皮肤缺等等共54个

replies.author: halucid
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 halucid 于 2012-12-1 07:02 编辑 
geludan 发表于 2012-11-30 07:11 
How did you even manage to know this thread, and create an account in this chinese system....
I suppose I'm just smarter than the average New Yorker. ^_^

I frequent all the Minecraft websites. Being a moderator myself (at Planet Minecraft), I like to keep tabs on what the community is taking about, regardless of the language barriers that separate us.

And I'm not surprised about the Google translation. Can I assume it was somewhat legible?

replies.author: geludan
replies.txt_content:
halucid 发表于 2012-12-1 00:00 
I suppose I'm just smarter than the average New Yorker. ^_^

I frequent all the Minecraft websit ...
Well, we do understand the translation from google, but it's like some sorts of confusing grammar... Equally, saying there is no structures in english, and all the words are translated in to an inappropriate meaning, I believe you can imagine that...

But, anyway, wow, moderator of planet minecraft... It still can't explain how on earth you managed to know there is a thread in a foreign forum having your productions immediately and register and reply whatsoever... In a word, are you god

replies.author: geludan
replies.txt_content:
halucid 发表于 2012-11-29 23:05 
I am glad that you enjoy my creations. It is amazing! They are being used all over the world! I woul ...
For instance, let me give you some straightforward and hilarious demonstration:

They are being used all over the world
Google's translation:他们正在使用世界各地
Which means.... They are using the world... Which obviously indicates that "world" is an object, and being used... Certainly is translated into a very awkward context...{:10_522:}

replies.author: halucid
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 halucid 于 2012-12-1 07:29 编辑 
geludan 发表于 2012-12-1 07:15 
Well, we do understand the translation from google, but it's like some sorts of confusing grammar. ...
Thank you, sir! I'm not quite a god, but I'm working on it.

The Chinese translations that I'm having are probably just as bad as the English translations you're having. Slang and improper usage causes a lot to be lost in translation. But still, technology has come a long way, and I'm happy with what I have. Without Google Translate, I'd have never found you guys.

replies.author: geludan
replies.txt_content:
halucid 发表于 2012-12-1 00:27 
Thank you, sir! I'm not quite a god, but I'm working on it.

The Chinese translations that I'm h ...
